resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 

I love fitness 

The kind that is alive and wims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 

Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 

And sometimes I even go fishing. 

And even less sometimes, I actualli catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I´ll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should aks someone else about fishing, though.
